page.title: 18TRADE TRANSPORT
page.content:
Manual workers. Many adults are unemployed in 1985. Light Industrial Units setting up on the airfield since 1983 include French Polishers. Engineering. Stained and Leaded glass. Woodworkers. Kitchen design and construction. Garage and servicing. RECREATION. Netball Cricket Football Tennis Horticulture Women's Institute Over 65 club Community Centre Brownies Sunday School Fish Club Playgroup
TRADE There is only one shop in the village selling most of the basic foodstuffs and small household items. Several mobile shops also visit the area. This is most useful as many inhabitants do not have a motor car and rely on the Bus service (cont)
